name: poke-flute
effect: Wakes up sleeping Pokémon.  Required to wake up sleeping snorlax on the overworld.
short_effect: Use to awaken sleeping Pokémon, including Snorlax on roads.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A sweet-sounding
flute that awakens
POKéMON.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A flute that is said to instantly
awaken any POKéMON. It has a
lovely tone.
flavor_text_entries.x-y:
A flute which can play with such a
beautiful tone that even sleeping
Pokémon find themselves roused.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
A flute that can play with such a beautiful tone
that even sleeping Pokémon find
themselves roused.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
A flute that can play with such a beautiful tone
that even sleeping Pokémon find
themselves roused.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
A flute that can play with such a beautiful tone that
even sleeping Pokémon find themselves woken up.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
A flute that can play with such a beautiful tone that
even sleeping Pokémon find themselves woken up.
